alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jackson and east central Josephine Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Applegate, or 14 miles southeast of Grants Pass, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rogue River, Valley Of The Rogue State Park, Williams, Applegate and Provolt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades
